data.Title: DOJ Considers Google Breakup
data.Description: The U.S. Department of Justice is considering forcing a Google breakup, which could involve separating Android and Chrome or requiring Google to share data with competitors.

data.Title: FTC Raises Concerns About Google App Store Monopoly Remedies
data.Description: The Federal Trade Commission has filed an amicus brief expressing concerns about remedies in the case where a jury found Google illegally monopolized the app store market.

data.Title: Google Search Updates and Features
data.Description: Google is testing new features and updates for its search engine, including smaller knowledge panel cards, AI-powered overviews with links, and a "connections" feature for knowledge panels.

data.Title: Google Deactivates Russian AdSense Accounts
data.Description: Google has deactivated AdSense accounts based in Russia.

data.Title: Bing's Brief Speed Advantage in 2017
data.Description: A Google document from 2017 revealed that Bing's search engine performance was faster than Google's for mobile queries at that time.

data.Title: OpenAI Enhances ChatGPT with Multi-Step Reasoning
data.Description: OpenAI has updated its ChatGPT chatbot to a new model that exhibits improved multi-step reasoning capabilities.

data.Title: Apple Expands Maps 'Look Around' Feature
data.Description: Apple is planning to expand the availability of its 'Look Around' feature in the Maps app, providing street-level imagery in more locations.

data.Title: Google's Handling of URL Parameters
data.Description: Google may be developing new ways to handle URL parameters in search, after retiring the URL parameter tool in Google Search Console in 2022.

data.Title: Google's 'Hidden Gems' Update Boosts Forum Visibility
data.Description: Google's 'hidden gems' update from fall 2023 caused many forums to surge in visibility, not just Reddit and Quora.

data.Title: Google's Effingo Data Transfer System
data.Description: Google's Effingo system transfers over 1 exabyte of data per day, including ranking signals, web and media indexes, and potentially raw bytes of user photos.

data.Title: Google Search Console Data Visibility
data.Description: There are concerns that Google Search Console may only be showing 35% of data for some sites, but Google claims most sites see most or all of their data.

data.Title: Google Hotel Listings Targeted by Hijackers
data.Description: Hijackers are targeting Google hotel listings, adding fake WhatsApp numbers and marking hotels as permanently closed.

data.Title: Google Gemini Research to Include Citations and Links
data.Description: Google Gemini Research will include citations and links to websites, potentially impacting the future of Google Search.

data.Title: Google Shopping Grid Expands to 5 Product Results
data.Description: Google Shopping grid now displays 5 product results, potentially impacting visibility and click-through rates for online retailers.

data.Title: HubSpot Launches Free AI Search Grader Tool
data.Description: HubSpot has released a free AI Search Grader tool that allows users to assess brand sentiment and share of voice in GPT-4o results, providing insights into brand visibility.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews Volatility Impacts Search Results
data.Description: Google AI Overviews are experiencing fluctuations in their presence within search results, impacting the visibility of traditional organic results and the user search experience.
